channel.title: Free Minecraft?
channel.description:
So I have MC on my mac, but cant play it because I need Java 1.6, and I can only get 1.5.... I want to get MC on my pc, but cant even load minecraft.net
Is there any way I can get minecraft for free? Help please? :\

item.title: Free Minecraft?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

There are ways of doing this, but I would recommend just loading an older version of the Minecraft.app and not updating it. Or dual boot your mac with linux or windows.

OR:
http://askubuntu.com/questions/271904/oracle-java-7-on-linux-powerpc

There is ways to get Java 7 for PowerPC(Older versions of Mac)

Read full topic
